name: Diamond Forms, Flows & Docs
description: Diamond is a forms and workflow automation tool, with extensive features for more complex forms (calculations, validations, autofill, signature) and process automation with automatic actions, document generation and system integration.
longDescription:
Effortless forms automation: 
Use Diamond Forms, Flows & Docs to create smart digital forms in your corporate identity. Automate your entire process with the workflow and document generation tools. Diamond exceeds other solutions with many unique functions:

- complex calculations (with formulas or linked Excel sheets)
- automatic actions (e-mails to invite, confirm or remind, saving data to the right systems, validating answers)
- digital signature
- document generation fully in your branding
- integration with other systems (payment providers, authentication, external data sources, back-office software)
- extensive security and privacy settings to remain GDPR compliant

Be 100% digital and manage complex processes, reduce your time to market, optimise workflows, work more efficiently, and comply with all regulations.
